组件

目录

快速上手 ​

⚠️ 前置条件

  • Node.js 22+
  • Vue.js 3.5+
  • TypeScript 5.9+

安装 ​

sh
npm i modern-ui
sh
pnpm add modern-ui

全局引入 ​

ts
import { createApp } from "vue";
import App from "./App.vue";
import ModernUI from "modern-ui";
import "modern-ui/dist/style.css";

const app = createApp(App);
app.use(ModernUI);
app.mount("#app");
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "types": ["modern-ui/components"]
  }
}
vue
<template>
    <MuButton>Button</MuButton>
<template/>

局部引入 ​

ts
import { createApp } from "vue";
import App from "./App.vue";
import "modern-ui";

const app = createApp(App);
app.mount("#app");
vue
<template>
    <MuButton>Button</MuButton>
<template/>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { MuButton } from "modern-ui";
</script>
